title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS bindings to run Llama-2, CodeLlama, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy local LLM inference.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with model management, chat history, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing synchronous & asynchronous APIs for Ollama.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with prompt templates and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes showing how to combine Ollama with RAG, agents, vector DBs, and fine-tuning.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub for quick local or cloud deployment.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Experimental repo demonstrating ReAct & tool-calling agents backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-mode to answer questions with Ollama models privately.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that connects to Ollama and supports model switching, markdown, and code rendering.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for the Ollama REST API with async/await and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-distroless
summary: Distroless & signed container images for Ollama produced by Chainguard for supply-chain security.
